Articles.Content: Did you changed the style of the main website ([www.kerbalspaceprogram.com](www.kerbalspaceprogram.com)) recently? Looks very good. And I like CSS3 animations very much. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Yes, it got a major overhaul. Glad you like it. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Yes it looks very very nice. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Nice work, Squad! That's a beautiful site! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
